about.description:
OmniSciDB is an in-memory, column store, SQL relational database
that was designed from the ground up to run on GPUs.

This recipe provides both CUDA enabled and CUDA disabled omniscidb
packages.

name: omniscidb

    - arrow-cpp-proc 3.* cpu
test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/opt/omnisci/bin/omnisci_server
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/opt/omnisci/bin/omnisci_initdb
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/opt/omnisci/bin/omnisql
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/opt/omnisci/bin/KafkaImporter
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/opt/omnisci/bin/StreamImporter
    - test -f "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d/omniscidb_activate.sh"
    - test -f "${PREFIX}/etc/conda/deactivate.d/omniscidb_deactivate.sh"
    - "if [[ -x \"$(command -v omnisql)\" ]]\nthen\n  echo \"Found omnisql in PATH\"\
      \nelse\n  echo \"omnisql not found in PATH(=$PATH)\" && exit 1\nfi\nsource ${PREFIX}/etc/conda/deactivate.d/omniscidb_deactivate.sh\n\
      if [[ -x \"$(command -v omnisql)\" ]]\nthen\n  echo \"Unexpectedly found omnisql\
      \ in PATH(=$PATH) after deactivation\"  && exit 1\nelse\n  echo \"omnisql not\
      \ in PATH after deactivation\"\nfi\nsource ${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d/omniscidb_activate.sh\n"
    - omnisql -v
    - which omnisci_initdb
    - which omnisci_server
    - 'mkdir data && omnisci_initdb data

      omnisci_server --version

      rm -rf data

      '
    - which omnisci_insert_sample_data
    - which startomnisci
about:
  description: 'OmniSciDB is an in-memory, column store, SQL relational database

    that was designed from the ground up to run on GPUs.


    This recipe provides both CUDA enabled and CUDA disabled omniscidb

    packages.

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/omnisci/omniscidb
  doc_url: https://www.omnisci.com/docs/latest/
  home: https://www.omnisci.com/
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: The OmniSci database
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - andrewseidl
    - jclay
    - pearu
    - xmnlab

about.description:
OmniSciDB is an in-memory, column store, SQL relational database
that was designed from the ground up to run on GPUs.

This recipe provides both CUDA enabled and CUDA disabled omniscidb
packages.

commands:
if [[ -x "$(command -v omnisql)" ]]
then
  echo "Found omnisql in PATH"
else
  echo "omnisql not found in PATH(=$PATH)" && exit 1
fi
source ${PREFIX}/etc/conda/deactivate.d/omniscidb_deactivate.sh
if [[ -x "$(command -v omnisql)" ]]
then
  echo "Unexpectedly found omnisql in PATH(=$PATH) after deactivation"  && exit 1
else
  echo "omnisql not in PATH after deactivation"
fi
source ${PREFIX}/etc/conda/activate.d/omniscidb_activate.sh

mkdir data && omnisci_initdb data
omnisci_server --version
rm -rf data
